name: Comparison Table 21
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign layout_gap = section.settings.layout_gap
  assign layout_gap_mobile = section.settings.layout_gap_mobile

  assign image = section.settings.image
  assign image_width = section.settings.image_width
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  
  assign table_columns = section.settings.table_columns
  assign table_radius = section.settings.table_radius
  assign table_border_color = section.settings.table_border_color
  assign table_border_thickness = section.settings.table_border_thickness

  assign table_row_active_bg_color = section.settings.table_row_active_bg_color

  assign first_heading = section.settings.first_heading
  assign first_heading_image = section.settings.first_heading_image
  assign first_heading_hide_mobile = section.settings.first_heading_hide_mobile
  assign first_info_text = section.settings.first_info_text
  
  assign second_heading = section.settings.second_heading
  assign second_heading_image = section.settings.second_heading_image
  assign second_heading_hide_mobile = section.settings.second_heading_hide_mobile
  assign second_info_text = section.settings.second_info_text
  
  assign third_heading = section.settings.third_heading
  assign third_heading_image = section.settings.third_heading_image
  assign third_heading_hide_mobile = section.settings.third_heading_hide_mobile
  assign third_info_text = section.settings.third_info_text
  
  assign fourth_heading = section.settings.fourth_heading
  assign fourth_heading_image = section.settings.fourth_heading_image
  assign fourth_heading_hide_mobile = section.settings.fourth_heading_hide_mobile
  assign fourth_info_text = section.settings.fourth_info_text
  
  assign fifth_heading = section.settings.fifth_heading
  assign fifth_heading_image = section.settings.fifth_heading_image
  assign fifth_heading_hide_mobile = section.settings.fifth_heading_hide_mobile
  assign fifth_info_text = section.settings.fifth_info_text
  
  assign sixth_heading = section.settings.sixth_heading
  assign sixth_heading_image = section.settings.sixth_heading_image
  assign sixth_heading_hide_mobile = section.settings.sixth_heading_hide_mobile
  assign sixth_info_text = section.settings.sixth_info_text

  assign table_heading_image_size_mobile = section.settings.table_heading_image_size_mobile
  assign table_heading_image_size = section.settings.table_heading_image_size 

  assign table_heading_size = section.settings.table_heading_size
  assign table_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.table_heading_size_mobile
  assign table_heading_color = section.settings.table_heading_color
  assign table_heading_custom = section.settings.table_heading_custom
  assign table_heading_font = section.settings.table_heading_font
  assign table_heading_height = section.settings.table_heading_height
  assign table_heading_align = section.settings.table_heading_align
  assign table_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.table_heading_align_mobile
  assign table_heading_padding_horizontal = section.settings.table_heading_padding_horizontal
  assign table_heading_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.table_heading_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign table_heading_padding_vertical = section.settings.table_heading_padding_vertical
  assign table_heading_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.table_heading_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign table_heading_horizontal_align = ""
  if table_heading_align == "center"
    assign table_heading_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif table_heading_align == "right"
    assign table_heading_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign table_heading_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign table_heading_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if table_heading_align_mobile == "center"
    assign table_heading_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif table_heading_align_mobile == "right"
    assign table_heading_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign table_heading_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif
  
  assign info_text_size = section.settings.info_text_size
  assign info_text_size_mobile = section.settings.info_text_size_mobile
  assign info_text_color = section.settings.info_text_color
  assign info_text_custom = section.settings.info_text_custom
  assign info_text_font = section.settings.info_text_font
  assign info_text_height = section.settings.info_text_height
  assign info_text_align = section.settings.info_text_align
  assign info_text_align_mobile = section.settings.info_text_align_mobile
  assign info_text_bg_color = section.settings.info_text_bg_color
  assign info_text_padding_horizontal = section.settings.info_text_padding_horizontal
  assign info_text_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.info_text_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign info_text_padding_vertical = section.settings.info_text_padding_vertical
  assign info_text_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.info_text_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign info_text_radius = section.settings.info_text_radius
  assign info_text_border_thickness = section.settings.info_text_border_thickness
  assign info_text_border_color = section.settings.info_text_border_color
  assign info_icon_color = section.settings.info_icon_color
  assign info_shadow = section.settings.info_shadow

  assign table_row_padding_horizontal = section.settings.table_row_padding_horizontal
  assign table_row_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.table_row_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign table_row_padding_vertical = section.settings.table_row_padding_vertical
  assign table_row_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.table_row_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign table_row_heading_size = section.settings.table_row_heading_size
  assign table_row_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.table_row_heading_size_mobile
  assign table_row_heading_color = section.settings.table_row_heading_color
  assign table_row_active_heading_color = section.settings.table_row_active_heading_color
  assign table_row_heading_custom = section.settings.table_row_heading_custom
  assign table_row_heading_font = section.settings.table_row_heading_font
  assign table_row_heading_height = section.settings.table_row_heading_height
  assign table_row_heading_align = section.settings.table_row_heading_align
  assign table_row_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.table_row_heading_align_mobile

  assign table_row_text_size = section.settings.table_row_text_size
  assign table_row_text_size_mobile = section.settings.table_row_text_size_mobile
  assign table_row_text_color = section.settings.table_row_text_color
  assign table_row_active_text_color = section.settings.table_row_active_text_color
  assign table_row_text_custom = section.settings.table_row_text_custom
  assign table_row_text_font = section.settings.table_row_text_font
  assign table_row_text_height = section.settings.table_row_text_height
  assign table_row_text_align = section.settings.table_row_text_align
  assign table_row_text_align_mobile = section.settings.table_row_text_align_mobile

  assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size
  assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile
  assign icon_yes_color = section.settings.icon_yes_color
  assign icon_no_color = section.settings.icon_no_color
  assign icon_yes_active_color = section.settings.icon_yes_active_color
  assign icon_no_active_color = section.settings.icon_no_active_color

  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  
  assign loading_attribute = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign loading_attribute = 'eiger'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ info_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ table_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ table_row_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ table_row_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .comparison-layout-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    align-items: center;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: {{ layout_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .comparison-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .comparison-table-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr;
    margin-top: 0px;
  }

  .comparison-table-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .comparison-table-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0 !important;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .comparison-table-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .comparison-table-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
  }

  .comparison-grid-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .comparison-grid-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide {
    opacity: 0 !important;
  }

  .comparison-grid-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
    opacity: 1 !important;
  }
  
  .comparison-grid-{{ section.id }}.active {
    border-radius: {{ table_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {    
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 6px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .comparison-border-item-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
  }

  .comparison-border-item-{{ section.id }}::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    width: 60%;
    background-color: {{ table_border_color }};
    height: {{ table_border_thickness }}px;
    top: 0;
    right: 50%;
    transform: translateX(50%);
  }

  .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
    gap: 20px;
  }

  .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ table_heading_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ table_heading_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-item-info-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    line-height: 0;
  }

  .comparison-item-info-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
  }

  .comparison-item-info-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    stroke: {{ info_icon_color }};
  }

  .comparison-item-info-{{ section.id }}:hover .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1 !important;
    pointer-events: all !important;
  }

  .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: -50px;
    left: -7rem;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    width: 280px;
    text-align: {{ info_text_align_mobile }};
    padding: {{ info_text_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ info_text_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ info_text_border_thickness }}px solid {{ info_text_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ info_text_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ info_text_bg_color }};
    z-index: 3;
  }

  .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ info_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ info_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ info_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;   
    display: block;
    font-weight: 400;
  }
  
  .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} h3 {
    margin: 0;
    display: flex !important;
    gap: 10px;
    justify-content: {{ table_heading_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    align-items: center;
    font-size: {{ table_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ table_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ table_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ table_heading_align_mobile }};
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} img {
    display: block;
    width: {{ table_heading_image_size_mobile }}px;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: contain;
  }

  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ table_row_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ table_row_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }}.active .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
    background-color: {{ table_row_active_bg_color }};
  }

  .comparison-item-heading-image-{{ section.id }} img {
    display: block;
    object-fit: contain;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child h3 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ table_row_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ table_row_heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ table_row_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ table_row_heading_align_mobile }};
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }}.active .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child h3 {
    color: {{ table_row_active_heading_color }};
  }

  .comparison-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ table_row_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ table_row_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ table_row_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-align: {{ table_row_text_align_mobile }};
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }}.active .comparison-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
    color: {{ table_row_active_text_color }};
  }

  .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} img,
  .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }} path {
    stroke: {{ icon_yes_color }}
  }
  
  .comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }} path {
    stroke: {{ icon_no_color }}
  }

  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }}.active .comparison-yes-icon-{{ section.id }} path {
    stroke: {{ icon_yes_active_color }}
  }
  
  .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }}.active .comparison-no-icon-{{ section.id }} path {
    stroke: {{ icon_no_active_color }}
  }

  .comparison-table-arrows-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 30px;
    justify-content: end;
  }

  .comparison-table-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .comparison-table-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  .comparison-table-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .comparison-table-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled{
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .comparison-table-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .comparison-table-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path  {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  .comparison-table-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .comparison-table-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
  }

  .comparison-grid-slide-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: 0 !important;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .comparison-layout-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: {{ image_width }}% 1fr;
      gap: {{ layout_gap }}px;
    }
    
    .comparison-table-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
      margin-top: 0px;
      flex-direction: column
    }

    .comparison-table-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid;
    }

    .comparison-table-mobile-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }

    .comparison-grid-{{ section.id }} {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: 1.2fr {% if table_columns > 0 %}1fr{% endif %} {% if table_columns > 1 %}1fr{% endif %} {% if table_columns > 2 %}1fr{% endif %} {% if table_columns > 3 %}1fr{% endif %} {% if table_columns > 4 %}1fr{% endif %} {% if table_columns > 5 %}1fr{% endif %};
    }

    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} img {
      width: {{ table_heading_image_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ table_heading_padding_vertical }}px {{ table_heading_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .comparison-border-item-{{ section.id }}:last-child::after {
      display: none;
    }

    .comparison-border-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:last-child)::after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      width: {{ table_border_thickness }}px;
      background-color: {{ table_border_color }};
      height: 60%;
      top: 50%;
      right: 0;
      transform: translateY(-50%);
    }

     .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} {
      top: -90px;
      left: -10rem;      
      width: 350px;     
    }

    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ info_text_align }};
      padding: {{ info_text_padding_vertical }}px {{ info_text_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ info_text_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} h3 {
      justify-content: {{ table_heading_horizontal_align }};
      text-align: {{ table_heading_align }};
      font-size: {{ table_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ table_row_padding_vertical }}px {{ table_row_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child h3 {
      text-align: {{ table_row_heading_align }};
      font-size: {{ table_row_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ table_row_text_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ table_row_text_align }};
    }

    .comparison-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ icon_size }}px;
    }

    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} {
      left: -30rem;   
    }

    .comparison-table-arrows-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if table_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} span {
      font-family: {{ table_heading_font.family }}, {{ table_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ table_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ table_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if info_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .comparison-grid-header-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-info-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ info_text_font.family }}, {{ info_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ info_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ info_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if table_row_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .comparison-grid-rows-{{ section.id }} .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child h3 {
      font-family: {{ table_row_heading_font.family }}, {{ table_row_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ table_row_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ table_row_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if table_row_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .comparison-item-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ table_row_text_font.family }}, {{ table_row_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ table_row_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ table_row_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if first_heading_hide_mobile %}
  <style> 
    .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(2) {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if second_heading_hide_mobile %}
  <style>
    .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(3) {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if third_heading_hide_mobile %}
  <style>  
    .comparison-item-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(4) {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>

  </style>

  }
  </style>

    }
  </style>

{% endif %}

    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .comparison-table-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .comparison-grid-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .comparison-table-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .comparison-grid-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

    .comparison-table-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .comparison-grid-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    }

                                {% elsif block.settings.fifth_icon == 'no' %}

                                {% endif %}
                              </div>                
                            {% endif %}
                          {% if block.settings.fifth_column != blank %}

                      {% if table_columns > 5 and sixth_heading != blank or sixth_heading_image != blank %}

                                    <path d="M2 10.8L9.44828 18L26 2" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="3"></path>

                                {% elsif block.settings.sixth_icon == 'no' %}

          </div>
          <div class="comparison-table-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
            <svg stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" viewBox="0 0 16 16" role="presentation" class="r-15pkctt" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M1 8a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5h11.793l-3.147-3.146a.5.5 0 0 1 .708-.708l4 4a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-4 4a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L13.293 8.5H1.5A.5.5 0 0 1 1 8"></path></svg>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initComparisonTable21() {
    function setEqualHeightsOnMobile() {
      const items = document.querySelectorAll(`.comparison-item-{{ section.id }}`);
      if (!items.length) return;
  
      if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
        let maxHeight = 0;

        items.forEach(item => {
          item.style.height = 'auto';
        });

        items.forEach(item => {
          const height = item.offsetHeight;
          if (height > maxHeight) {
            maxHeight = height;
          }
        });

        items.forEach(item => {
          item.style.height = maxHeight + 'px';
        });
      } else {
        items.forEach(item => {
          item.style.height = 'auto';
        });
      }
    }
    document.querySelector(`.comparison-table-slider-{{ section.id }}`).classList.remove('preview');
    
    const slider = new Swiper(".comparison-table-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300, 
      slidesPerView: 1, 
      effect: "fade",
      navigation: {
        prevEl: '.comparison-table-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',       
        nextEl: '.comparison-table-btn-next-{{ section.id }}'  
      },
    }); 

    setEqualHeightsOnMobile();     
    let resizeTimeout;
    window.addEventListener('resize', () => { 
      setEqualHeightsOnMobile();     
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initComparisonTable21);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initComparisonTable21);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initComparisonTable21);
  }
</script>
